tooltips.users: Lists all the users that are part of the organisation. Users can be added and roles changed here.

message.addUsers: Enter emails below to invite users to this organisation.
message.addUsers_org: Enter emails below to invite users to {{org}}.
message.changePassword: An email will be sent with a password change link.
message.changePassword_email: An email will be sent to {{email}} with a password change link.
message.confirmDelAccounts_one: This user will no longer have access to this organisation.
message.confirmDelAccounts_other: These users will no longer have access to this organisation.
message.confirmDelAccounts_org_one: This user will no longer have access to {{org}}.
message.confirmDelAccounts_org_other: These users will no longer have access to {{org}}.
message.confirmRestoreAccess: Access was revoked due to brute force protections.
message.confirmRestoreAccess_user: Access for {{user}} was revoked due to brute force protections.
message.deleteProfile: Your profile will permanently be removed from your organisation.
message.deleteProfile_org: Your profile will permanently be removed from {{org}}.
message.howToAddUsers: Use the 'Add User' button at the top right of this page or use the button below to add users to your organisation
message.profilePicture: This helps others recognise you and lets you know that you're signed in to the correct account.
message.userPageInfo: The users in your organisation are shown on this page
message.warnCreateAccount: Are you sure you wish to create this account?
